Usage

For full details please see the hugo-easy-gallery GitHub page. Basic usages from above are:

  • Create a gallery with open and close tags and
  • `` will use image.jpg for thumbnail and lightbox
  • `` will use thumb.jpg for thumbnail and image.jpg for lightbox
  • `` will use image-small.jpg for thumbnail and image.jpg for lightbox
  • All the features/parameters of Hugoâ€™s built-in figure shortcode work as normal, i.e. src, link, title, caption, class, attr (attribution), attrlink, alt
  • `` will fade in captions for all figures in this gallery instead of the default slide-up behavior
  • Many gallery styles for captions and hover effects exist; view the hugo-easy-gallery GitHub for all options
  • Note that this theme will load the photoswipe gallery theme and scripts by default, no need to load photoswipe on your individual pages
